article_title: Silicon Valley's Cost of Living Crisis, a Peninsula Press report
article_text:
By An-Li Herring

A disparate group of Bay Area residents, some of whom would easily be able to afford their own apartments in other regions, have found roommates to share the cost of rent.

READ MORE

article_metadata.description: Peninsula Press examines how housing shortages and development priorities are creating clashes across Silicon Valley.
